Command.Name: Emergency Cars
Command.Title: Слоты для замены транспорта Экстренных Служб.
Command.Description:
### Полиция
 `POLICE` - Stanier `POLICE2` - Buffalo `POLICE3` - Vapid Interceptor `POLICE4` - Unmarked Stanier `POLICE5` - Stanier LE Cruiser `POLGAUNTLET` - Gauntlet Interceptor `POLICEOLD1` - Rancher `POLICEOLD2` - Esperanto `POLICEB` - Bike `POLICET` - Transporter `POLICET3` - Burrito (Bail Enforcement) `POLDORADO` - Dorado Cruiser `POLGREENWOOD` - Greenwood Cruiser `POLIMPALER5` - Impaler SZ Cruiser `POLIMPALER6` - Impaler LX Cruiser `POLTERMINUS` - Terminus Patrol `POLFACTION2` - Outreach Faction `POLCOQUETTE4` - Coquette D10 Pursuit `POLCARACARA` - Caracara Pursuit `PREDATOR` - Police Boat `POLMAV` - Maverick `RIOT` - Brute Riot `RIOT2` - Brute RCV `PRANGER` - Granger 
### Шерифы `SHERIFF` - Stanier `SHERIFF2` - Declasse SUV 
### FIB `FBI` - Buffalo `FBI2` - Declasse SUV 
### Парамедики и Пожарные `FIRETRUK` - MTL Firetruck `AMBULANCE` - Brute Ambulance 
### Спасатели `LGUARD` - Declasse SUV `BLAZER` - Quadbike
